mapper.select: SELECT rcp_no, rcp_title, rcp_content, rcp_video, rcp_main_photo, rcp_tag, cook_amount, cook_time, cook_kind, cook_level, rcp_view, member_no FROM RECIPE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND rcp_no = #{rcpNo}
SELECT D.* FROM DIVISION D JOIN RECIPE R ON D.rcp_no = R.rcp_no WHERE D.status= 'Y' AND D.rcp_no = ${rcp_no}
SELECT I.* FROM INGREDIENTS_INFO I JOIN DIVISION D ON I.div_no = d.div_no WHERE I.status = 'Y' AND D.div_no = ${div_no}
SELECT CO.* FROM COOK_ORDER CO JOIN RECIPE R ON CO.rcp_no = R.rcp_no WHERE CO.status= 'Y' AND CO.rcp_no = ${rcp_no}
SELECT CT.* FROM COOK_TIP CT JOIN COOK_ORDER CO ON CT.cook_ord_no = CO.cook_ord_no WHERE CT.status= 'Y' AND CT.cook_ord_no = ${cook_ord_no}

SELECT RV.review_content, RV.review_create_date, RV.rating, RV.review_photo, RV.review_type, RV.member_no, M.member_nickname, RV.rcp_no, M.member_profile FROM REVIEW RV JOIN RECIPE R ON RV.rcp_no = R.rcp_no JOIN MEMBER M ON RV.member_no = M.member_no WHERE RV.status ='Y' AND RV.review_type='2' ORDER BY RV.review_no DESC

select q.qna_no, q.qna_content, q.qna_create_date, q.qna_answer_type, q.qna_photo, q.ref_qna_no, q.rcp_no, q.pdopt_no, q.member_no, member_nickname as "writerNickname", member_profile as "writerProfile", a.qna_no as "answerNo", a.qna_content as "answerContent", a.qna_create_date as "answerCreateDate" FROM QNA q JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN QNA a ON q.qna_no = a.ref_qna_no WHERE q.rcp_no = #{recipeNo} and q.qna_type = 2 and q.status = 'Y' ORDER BY qna_create_date ASC
SELECT count(review_no) FROM REVIEW WHERE status = 'Y' AND rcp_no =#{recipeNo}
SELECT count(qna_no) FROM QNA WHERE status = 'Y' AND rcp_no =#{rcpNo} AND qna_type=2 AND qna_answer_type=1
SELECT product_no, product_name, product_brand, normal_price, sale_price, discount, main_img FROM PRODUCT WHERE status = 'Y' AND product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ingreName}, '%') LIMIT 1
SELECT product_no, product_name, product_brand, normal_price, sale_price, discount, main_img FROM PRODUCT WHERE status = 'Y' ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO RECIPE ( rcp_title, rcp_content, rcp_main_photo, rcp_video, rcp_tag, cook_amount, cook_time, cook_kind, cook_level, member_no ) VALUES ( #{recipeTitle}, #{recipeContent}, #{recipeMainPhoto}, #{recipeVideo}, #{recipeTag}, #{cookAmount}, #{cookTime}, #{cookKind}, #{cookLevel}, #{memberNo} ) RETURNING *
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INGREDIENTS_INFO( ingre_name, ingre_amount, ingre_unit, div_no ) VALUES( #{ingreName}, #{ingreAmount}, #{ingreUnit}, #{divNo} )
INSERT INTO review ( review_content, rating, review_photo, review_type, rcp_no, member_no ) VALUES ( #{reviewContent}, #{rating}, #{reviewPhoto}, 2, #{refRecipeNo}, #{refMemberNo} )
insert into QNA ( qna_content, qna_type, qna_answer_type, qna_photo, rcp_no, member_no ) values ( #{qnaContent}, 2, 1, #{qnaPhoto}, #{refRecipeNo}, #{writerNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_PWD, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_GENDER, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS, M.MEMBER_BIRTH, M.MEMBER_PROFILE, M.MEMBER_GRADE, M.MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, M.MEMBER_MODIFY_DATE, M.MEMBER_STATUS, M.ALARM_STATUS, M.LOGIN_SIGN_PATH FROM RECIPE R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.member_no = R.member_no WHERE R.rcp_no = #{recipeNo} AND M.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE RECIPE SET rcp_title = #{recipeTitle}, rcp_content = #{recipeContent}, rcp_main_photo = #{recipeMainPhoto}, rcp_video = #{recipeVideo}, rcp_tag = #{recipeTag}, cook_amount = #{cookAmount}, cook_time = #{cookTime}, cook_kind = #{cookKind}, cook_level = #{cookLevel}, member_no = #{memberNo} WHERE rcp_no = #{recipeNo}
UPDATE DIVISION SET div_name = #{divName}, status ='Y' WHERE rcp_no = #{recipeNo} AND div_no = #{divNo}

UPDATE INGREDIENTS_INFO SET ingre_name = #{ingreName}, ingre_amount = #{ingreAmount}, ingre_unit = #{ingreUnit}, status ='Y' WHERE div_no = #{divNo} AND div_no IN ( SELECT div_no FROM DIVISION WHERE status = 'Y' )
UPDATE COOK_ORDER SET cook_ord_content = #{cookOrdContent}, cook_ord_photo = #{cookOrdPhoto} WHERE rcp_no = #{rcpNo} AND status = 'Y'
UPDATE COOK_TIP SET cook_tip_content = #{cookTipContent} WHERE cook_ord_no = #{cookOrdNo} AND cook_ord_no IN ( SELECT cook_ord_no FROM COOK_ORDER WHERE status = 'Y' ) AND status = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DIVISION WHERE rcp_no = #{recipeNo} AND status = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INGREDIENTS_INFO WHERE div_no = #{divNo} AND status = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cook_order WHERE rcp_no = #{recipeNo} AND status = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cook_tip WHERE cook_ord_no = #{cookOrdNo} AND status = 'Y'
